show_toolbar_button.title: display button in toolbar
show_toolbar_button.description: The <-> button in the notebook toolbar gives access to a dropdown with quick access to all available cell sizes, in addition to the palette and keyboard shortcuts. You can adjust cell width among full width, half width, 1/3, 2/3, etc.

windowing_mode_defer.title: set windowing mode to defer
windowing_mode_defer.description: JupyterLab has a 'full' windowing mode, that improves performance with large notebooks. This extension is not compatible with full windowing mode, so by default this extension will set windowing mode to 'defer' upon activation. You can turn off this option, to keep the extension from changing the windowing mode. Be aware however that the gridwidth extension may not work properly in this case.
